Class Polynomial.Term

java.lang.Object
  com.dautelle.realtime.RealtimeObject
      com.dautelle.math.functions.Polynomial.Term
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Comparable, Realtime, java.io.Serializable
Enclosing class:
Polynomial
public static final class Polynomial.Term
extends RealtimeObject
implements java.lang.Comparable

This class represents the term of a polynomial such as x·y².
